subject: Steroids
Drug Abuse and Traffic
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: A former chemist for the Bay Area Laboratory Co-Operative testified in a San Francisco courtroom that he had provided the former cyclist Tammy Thomas with designer steroids, directly contradicting her grand jury testimony.
snippet: A former chemist for the Bay Area Laboratory Co-Operative testified in a San Francisco courtroom that he had provided the former cyclist Tammy Thomas with designer steroids, directly contradicting her grand jury testimony.
